objects.description: [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) executed [CHOPSTICK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0023) by using rundll32 commands such as rundll32.exe “C:\Windows\twain_64.dll”. [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) also executed a .dll for a first stage dropper using rundll32.exe. An [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) loader Trojan saved a batch script that uses rundll32 to execute a DLL payload.

external_references.description: Bitdefender. (2015, December). APT28 Under the Scope. Retrieved February 23, 2017.
Alperovitch, D.. (2016, June 15). Bears in the Midst: Intrusion into the Democratic National Committee. Retrieved August 3, 2016.
Unit 42. (2018, February 28). Unit 42 Playbook Viewer - Sofacy. Retrieved March 15, 2018.
